author: Sean O'Kane
title: Fisker is building an electric popemobile
description: Electric vehicle startup Fisker Inc. says it’s building a custom version of its Ocean SUV for the Vatican, to be used as the so-called popemobile. Fisker says it will deliver the SUV next year.
content:
Henrik Fisker met with Pope Francis and will deliver the modified SUV next year 
Image: Fisker Inc.
EV startup Fisker Inc. says it will make the first all-electric popemobile, using a modified vers… [+2720 chars]

author: Hyunjoo Jin
title: Explainer: Tesla drops radar; is Autopilot system safe? - Reuters
description: Tesla Inc (TSLA.O) has dropped radar sensors from its semi-autonomous driving system, Autopilot, raising concerns over the safety of the camera-only version, Tesla Vision.

author: Reuters
title: Tesla issues two U.S. recalls to address seat belt issues - Reuters
description: Tesla Inc (TSLA.O) is issuing two new recalls to address seat belt issues, it said on Thursday.
